Title: Entitles broadband service providers to the same attachment privileges, rates, and rights as competitive local exchange carriers and cable companies
Summary: Entitles broadband service providers to the same attachment privileges, rates, and rights as competitive local exchange carriers and cable companies; requires the public service commission to prescribe a process by which existing pole and attachment owners must provide for make-ready services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to entitling broadband service providers to the same attachment privileges, rates, and rights as competitive local exchange carriers and cable companies
